p: The 2019 International AIDS Society (IAS) HIV and HBV Cure Forum took place on 20 and 21 July 2019 in Mexico City, Mexico, ahead of the IAS 2019 HIV Science Conference. Co-chaired by experts in both HIV and HBV fields, the Forum focused specifically on the intersection between the scientific efforts in hepatitis B virus (HBV) and HIV-1 cure research and sought to encourage interaction between these two disciplines to accelerate the pace of cure discovery in both fields.
